deployment.author: Kartik
deployment.message:
feat: Complete Azure deployment package ready for production
🚀 DEPLOYMENT READY - All files configured for Azure Central India
✅ Core Deployment Files: - deploy-to-azure.sh: Complete Azure CLI deployment script - backend/startup.sh: Azure App Service startup configuration - DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Step-by-step deployment guide
✅ CI/CD Pipeline: - .github/workflows/azure-deployment.yml: GitHub Actions workflow - Automated testing for backend (Django) and frontend (React) - Automatic deployments on code push to main branch
✅ Environment Configuration: - backend/.env.production: Production environment variables - frontend/.env.production: Frontend production settings - Azure PostgreSQL, Blob Storage, Static Web Apps ready
✅ Architecture & URLs: - Frontend: https://kartik-excel-mapper-frontend.azurestaticapps.net - Backend: https://kartik-excel-mapper-backend.azurewebsites.net - Database: kartik-excel-mapper-db-server.postgres.database.azure.com - Region: Central India (Pune) - Resource Group: kartik-excel-mapper-rg
✅ Features Ready: - Complete Excel Template Mapper functionality - AI-powered column mapping with confidence scores - Interactive spreadsheet data editor (AG-Grid) - Smart tags system with formula builder - Template management and reusability - File upload/download with Azure Blob Storage - Production-ready security and performance settings
🎯 DEPLOYMENT STEPS: 1. Install Azure CLI: brew install azure-cli 2. Run deployment: ./deploy-to-azure.sh 3. Wait 5-10 minutes for completion 4. Access live application at public URLs
💰 Estimated Cost: ~/month 🔒 Security: HTTPS, Azure managed certificates, secure database 📊 Monitoring: Application Insights ready, comprehensive logging 🔄 CI/CD: GitHub Actions for automatic deployments
🌐 READY FOR PUBLIC ACCESS - Anyone can use the application once deployed!
🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
deployment.statusText: Deployment has been stopped due to SCM container restart. The restart can happen due to a management operation on site. Do not perform a management operation and a deployment operation in quick succession. Adding a small delay can help avoid any conflicts.
